text: Hendrik Paul "Rie" Diricx (7 July 1927 â€“ 4 July 2018) was a Belgian football player. He was born in Duffel. Dirickx played for Union Saint-Gilloise. He earned a total of 30 caps for Belgium between 1952 and 1960. He was part at the 1954 FIFA World Cup. Dirickx died on 4 July 2018, three days before his 91st birthday. == References == Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Belgian footballers Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Henri Dirickx
